panels.description: Top nodes by disk usage across the OpenSearch cluster.

targets.expr: topk(10, sort_desc((100 * (sum by(job,opensearch_cluster,node) (opensearch_fs_path_total_bytes{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster"})- sum by(job,opensearch_cluster,node) (opensearch_fs_path_free_bytes{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster"})) / sum by(job,opensearch_cluster,node) (opensearch_fs_path_total_bytes{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster"}))))

panels.title: Top nodes by disk usage

panels.description: Top indices by combined fetch, query, and scroll request rate across the OpenSearch cluster.
panels.title: Top indices by request rate

panels.description: Top indices by combined fetch, query, and scroll latency across the OpenSearch cluster.

targets.expr:
topk(10, sort_desc(sum by(index, job,opensearch_cluster) ((increase(opensearch_index_search_fetch_time_seconds{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:])
+increase(opensearch_index_search_query_time_seconds{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:])
+increase(opensearch_index_search_scroll_time_seconds{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:]))
/ clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_search_fetch_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:])
+increase(opensearch_index_search_query_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:])
+increase(opensearch_index_search_scroll_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:]), 1))))

panels.title: Top indices by request latency

panels.description: Top indices by cache hit ratio for the combined request and query cache across the OpenSearch cluster.

targets.expr:
topk(10, sort_desc(avg by(index, job,opensearch_cluster) (
  100 * (opensearch_index_requestcache_hit_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_querycache_hit_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}) / 
  clamp_min((opensearch_index_requestcache_hit_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_querycache_hit_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_requestcache_miss_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_querycache_miss_number{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}), 1
  ))))
targets.refId: Top indices by combined cache hit ratio

panels.title: Top indices by combined cache hit ratio

panels.description: Top indices by indexing latency across the OpenSearch cluster.

targets.expr: topk(10, avg by(index, job,opensearch_cluster) (increase(opensearch_index_indexing_index_time_seconds{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:]) / clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_indexing_index_count{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:]), 1)))
